reviewText: We don't like it because it cant be played in our region!!!!! Never have had one like this!!!! Ive had everyone look at it but no one can get it to play!!!!! Very disappointed!!!! Our grandson loves Tom & Jerry but cant even watch it!!!!
When I received this it would not play on my DVD player

This collection was great!  The collection was only missing two episodes, Ep 14 - The Million Dollar Cat, and Ep 100 - Busy Buddies. The quality of the episodes were outstanding. I know this was region 2 but it fit my needs exactly.
It was not in a format that could be played in the US.
This product stinks won't run in any DVD player because it is wrong region
I love Tom and Jerry. Be mindful of the "region 2" at the end of the description... That means that it won't work on most U.S. DVD players. Customer service was nice though
